tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeeAvailabilityData (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(100),
    availability_weekday VARCHAR(20),
    availability_start_time TIME,
    availability_end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
  meeting_id INT NOT NULL,
  meeting_date DATE,
  meeting_time TIME,
  employee_id INT NOT NULL,
  meeting_topic VARCHAR(100),
  PRIMARY KEY (meeting_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    availability_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    availability_end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_name VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_start_time TIME,
    meeting_end_time TIME,
    employee_attendees INT[]
)

CREATE TABLE Trainings (
    training_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_date DATE,
    training_start_time TIME,
    training_end_time TIME,
    trainer_id INT,
    max_attendees INT
)

CREATE TABLE TeamAvailability (
	employee_id INT,
	date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME,
	PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, date)
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
	meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	meeting_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	description TEXT,
	meeting_date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE TrainingSessions (
	session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	session_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	duration_hours INT,
	session_date DATE,
	start_time TIME,
	end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time DATETIME,
    end_time DATETIME,
    attendees TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Availability (
    availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
